--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 3/10/03 5:39:51 PM Central Standard Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "Take care, my dear"he said softly "I know by experience what is 
the 
> > Rust Plague... and I don't like lost you...."
> > 
> 
> This tugged at her, both on her Organic & Techno sides. Such words 
made her 
> form burn & chill at the same time. 
> 
> >"You won't,"< again, she replied just as softly. The softer side 
of her was 
> more than rare for her. Her devotion to Megatron... she knew was 
nearly her 
> downfall so many times. But.. she didn't care.

"Awwww, does someone need a hug?" Empath taunts, having eavesdropped 
on the conversation.
